message:
Saluting the accomplishments of all women on International Women's Day & gratitude for their indispensable role in our society. 

From 'Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao' to better health & education facilities, our Govt's efforts towards women-led development are unwavering. Our financial inclusion efforts, skill development initiatives & MUDRA Bank will empower our Nari Shakti to contribute to India's growth.
